channel.title: Help with else if commands
channel.description:
okay so i need help,say for instance i wanted a command that when you typed in "cashin" it would take away 2147000000 gold (995), and gave them another item (for this we will say an abby whip)(4151),but if they didnt have 2.147bill it would say "type this in again when you have 2.147bill noob",please help
thanks in advance!

item.title: Help with else if commands
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Use it like this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("cashin")) {
    if(!playerHasItem(995, 10000000) {
        sendMessage("You don't have enough gold....);
    } else {
        deleteitem(995, 10000000);
        addItem(4151, 1);
    }
}

The if-else has to be inside the command for this to work.

Read full topic
